message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet halfway at $10,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,500? I'm really interested in this product and would like to make a deal happen.
